summary: This is a brief internal email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) regarding the rescheduling of a call about the Epstein case from Friday to Monday, July 1, 2019, at 2 PM. It indicates ongoing coordination within the prosecution team.

events.title: Rescheduled Epstein Case Call
events.description: A call regarding the Epstein case, originally scheduled for the previous Friday, is rescheduled for Monday, July 1, 2019, at 2:00 PM.

keyFacts: The email is internal correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
It concerns the rescheduling of a call about the Epstein case to Monday, July 1, 2019, at 2 PM.
The email date (June 30, 2019) places this communication shortly after Epstein's arrest in July 2019, indicating active case coordination.
